description: This is a test specification file for the AppComponent of an Angular application. It includes test cases for verifying component creation, title property correctness, and rendering output.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The main application component being tested.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing environment asynchronously before each test, configuring the testing module with AppComponent.

methods.name: it should create the app
methods.description: Test to verify that an instance of AppComponent can be created successfully.

methods.name: it should have the 'angular' title
methods.description: Test to check that the AppComponent has its title property set to 'angular'.

methods.name: it should render title
methods.description: Test to ensure that the component renders the expected title text within an h1 element.
